11379.quoteText:
Applicable law

This Agreement shall be governed in all respects by the substantive laws of Switzerland. Any controversy, claim, or dispute arising out of or relating to the Privacy Policy shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the competent courts of the Canton of Geneva, the jurisdiction of the Swiss Federal Court being expressly reserved
11379.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

11380.quoteText: This Service is provided exclusively to individuals who are at least 13 years of age, or to minors who have obtained parental or legal guardian consent to open and maintain an account.
11380.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

11381.quoteText: Sending or transmitting unsolicited advertisements or content ("Spam") over the Service, via e-mail or any other communication channel;
11381.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

tosdr.case: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

11382.quoteText: None of the software on our apps will ever access or track any location-based information from your device at any time.
11382.title: This service does not collect, use, or share location data

tosdr.case: This service does not collect, use, or share location data

11383.quoteText: The Company may at its sole discretion terminate service without cause or notice.
11383.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

tosdr.case: They may stop providing the service at any time

11384.quoteText:
Changes to our Privacy Policy

ProtonVPN reserves the right to periodically review and change this policy, and we will notify users who have enabled the notification preference about changes to our Privacy Policy. Continued use of the Service will be deemed as acceptance of such changes.
11384.title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

11385.quoteText: Through the Service, you can directly access, edit, delete or export personal data processed by the Company in your use of the Service.
11385.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data
